extendedInfo.description: As a new android game developer, we, EasyFunGame, has already and is continuing to create free but fun games to you. Even though we have a tough time, we truly believe one faith that we could decorate the world with games.And in the past year, one of our games - -has gained a very good reputation which is favored by players all over the world.Now, as the founder of EasyFunGame studio, I highly recommend this funny game to you. In this game, you play as a poor bird whose cherries have been robbed by some bad guys. You need to get over all kinds of difficulties to get them back.Control:1. Touch right area to move bird up and down2. Touch left area to rush forward in a line when energy retrieved after you eat some cherries.3. Touch the skill button to use special power.Goal:60 levels are waiting for you. Have much fun!Any suggestion? Drop me an e-mail: Young@easyfungame.com

reviews.title: A new angry bird addiction
reviews.comment: Great game! No problems with playing, well, except that I cant pass level 20 after 3 days of trying! hard enough to be challenging, but easy enough to keep my 9 yr old fighting me for my phone! Only down side is the back ground music is as anoying as tge 80\'s Mario brothers! lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: O_O
reviews.comment: I couldnt fly up. I did touch and hold down on the screen though..did what it asked. But the bird just fell straight down! Couldnt get through 5 seconds of lvl 1...lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just ok
reviews.comment: This game is okay but it lags pretty bad on thunderbolt do I uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t play further than level 1
reviews.comment: The game, once completing level one, goes to a black screen and just sits there.... When I back out, kill the app, then go back in, i have to start level one again... Will leave installed in hopes of a response from the developers
reviews.author: Wes Calk

reviews.title: Uninstal
reviews.comment: It barely reacts to my touch... it was like the button was broken or with an imperfect contact... went down, or barely keeping level or asceneing really slow... plus the game screen was larger than my screan, so i could\'t close the ommercial page wich was on 30% of the screen.  From my LG P500
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: irritable
reviews.comment: The worst game i have ever played.Very Disappointed not worth the one star.i cant pass level 20 i did try more then 100 time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: THIS THING IS SO STUPID
reviews.comment: DO NOT GET THIS APP EVER IT IS THE WORST APP. ONCE I OPENED IT I STARTED PLAYING IT WORKED PERFECTLY I WAS FLYING BUT THEN MILLIONS OF APPS WENT RIGHT IN MY SCREEN THEN I REFRESHED OPEN THE APP PLAYED FLYING THEN 2 SECONDS LATER IT DROPS! Annoying apps just like this 1...
reviews.author: Anela Irven

reviews.title: Most stupid game ever
reviews.comment: Wasting your time Bad touch  Not sensitive You cant play it for more than 10 secs Adddddds   Force close

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Change the music old fashioned and weird

reviews.comment: Very challenging and addictive!!

reviews.title: Wth
reviews.comment: It was fun until i got to level 15, i would beat it but it would repeatedly have me do it again ever time i re opened the game. Lame!

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: For those who cant fly, plz touch the right part of your screen, not in the middle of screen.

reviews.comment: can u make it available to move to sd card? plz. many time touch but not fly up or fly up late. good idea , good game , good graphic

reviews.title: its so stupid.

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Graphics are cool but flying the bird needs to be more quicker and smooth making it easier to not die and actually get through the game.
